attributes.action: Bring South West water charges in line with other water companies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all use more or the same water & facilities. It is unfair for the people of the south-west to foot the bill for the coastline. We are no different why should we pay more?. If the southwest coastline requires more money invested surely it is not the residents who should pay but the end users.
